INSERT INTO STUDIO_ROOM VALUES (#{roomNo}, #{roomName}, #{roomAbout}, #{roomConfig}, #{roomPrice}, #{roomDiscount}, DEFAULT, #{roomPrimaryOption}, #{roomHref})
mapper.update: UPDATE STUDIO_ROOM SET ROOM_NAME = #{roomName}, ROOM_ABOUT = #{roomAbout}, ROOM_CONFIG = #{roomConfig}, ROOM_PRICE = #{roomPrice}, ROOM_DISCOUNT = #{roomDiscount}, ROOM_PRIMARY_OPTION = #{roomPrimaryOption}, ROOM_HREF = #{roomHref} WHERE ROOM_NO = #{roomNo}

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM STUDIO_ROOM WHERE ROOM_STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT 0 ROOM_NO, 'ALL' ROOM_NAME , COUNT(*) CNT FROM RESERVATION JOIN STUDIO_ROOM USING (ROOM_NO) WHERE ROOM_STATUS = 'Y' UNION ALL SELECT ROOM_NO, ROOM_NAME, COUNT(*) CNT FROM RESERVATION JOIN STUDIO_ROOM USING (ROOM_NO) WHERE ROOM_STATUS = 'Y' GROUP BY ROOM_NO, ROOM_NAME ORDER BY ROOM_NO

SELECT NVL(SUM(A.CNT), 0) CNT FROM (SELECT ROOM_NAME, TO_CHAR(RV_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') RV_DATE, COUNT(*) CNT FROM RESERVATION JOIN STUDIO_ROOM USING (ROOM_NO) WHERE ROOM_STATUS = 'Y' AND ROOM_NO = #{roomNo} AND RV_DATE BETWEEN '2021-08-18' AND '2021-08-23' GROUP BY ROOM_NAME, RV_DATE ) A, ( SELECT TO_DATE('2021-08-18', 'YYYY-MM-DD') + LEVEL - 1 AS DT FROM DUAL CONNECT BY LEVEL <= ( TO_DATE('2021-08-23', 'YYYY-MM-DD') - TO_DATE('2021-08-18', 'YYYY-MM-DD') + 1) ) B WHERE B.DT = RV_DATE(+) GROUP BY ROOM_NAME, B.DT ORDER BY B.DT

SELECT * FROM (SELECT RV_NO, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_NICK, ROOM_NO, ROOM_NAME, RV_DATE, RV_TIME, RV_PEOPLE, RV_CARS, RV_ANIMALS, RV_PURPOSE,RV_ETC, RV_STATUS FROM RESERVATION JOIN STUDIO_ROOM USING(ROOM_NO) JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) ORDER BY RV_NO DESC) WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN 1 AND 3
